description.value:
Vlakas can be born with one of three possible sets of senses. During character creation, determine a vlaka’s senses by choosing from those available. A vlaka born with functional sight or hearing who becomes permanently blind or deaf does not gain the abilities of a vlaka born with blindness or deafness.

  • @Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.qYhK5EbbIJxOn8GI]{Blind}: A blind vlaka has @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.3NE2nvMbEhINPfdr]{Blindsight} (hearing) with a range of 60 feet, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.3NE2nvMbEhINPfdr]{Blindsight}(scent) with a range of 30 feet, and the @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{Blinded} condition. The vlaka is naturally sightless, so the @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{Blinded} condition can be removed only by effects that grant sight to creatures with no natural vision.
  • @Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.ctpOXvd490wRVUvc]{Deaf}: A deaf vlaka has @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.3NE2nvMbEhINPfdr]{Blindsight} (scent) with a range of 30 feet, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.0Cp962afGbUo0VD1]{Low-Light Vision}, and the @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.D8JvCEmOiWKe2UDx]{Deafened} condition. However, this condition imposes no penalty to initiative rolls or opposed @Compendium[sfrpg.skills.CzEAY60hUMyfOC4G]{Perception} checks that are not based on hearing. The vlaka is naturally without hearing, so the @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.D8JvCEmOiWKe2UDx]{Deafened} condition can be removed only by effects that grant hearing to creatures with no natural ability to perceive sound.
  • @Compendium[sfrpg.racial-features.4H0SuNhQX4wfS0wQ]{Hearing and Sighted}: A vlaka who has hearing and sight also has @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.RVk6hgUCq3SDfeCb]{Blindsense} (scent) with a range of 30 feet and @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.0Cp962afGbUo0VD1]{Low-Light Vision}.
